text: Joseph Albert Wapner (November 15, 1919 - February 26, 2017) was an American judge and former television "judge." He is the first star of the ongoing reality courtroom series The People's Court.Joseph A. Wapner Interview, Archive of American Television, July 11, 2005, accessed November 26, 2013 Wapner died on February 26, 2017 under hospice care in Los Angeles after suffering from respiratory failure, aged 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Joseph A. Wapner Archive of American Television Interview Category:1919 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:American judges Category:Television personalities from California Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Joseph Wapner
